select l.Aset_ID,l.kodeSatker,s.NamaSatker,l.kodeKelompok,l.noRegister,l.tahun,l.NilaiPerolehan,l.MasaManfaat,l.UmurEkonomis,l.AkumulasiPenyusutan,l.NilaiBuku from bangunan l inner join satker s on s.kode=l.kodeSatker and s.Kd_Ruang is null where aset_id in (202312,202305,200929,202236,1712499,202163,202156,202144,200141,202188,202189,202191,200163,200164,200154,200209,200084,201869,201870,202167,2128493,718773,718779,718781,718888,201888,200318,202051,200327,200829,200883,200805,200892,1867372,201976,1774181,201009,201094,201126,201183,201214,201309,201363,201376,201410,201460,201566,201569,201572,2643983,2643993,2644009,2644011,2644027,2644060,2644070,2644081,200936,200942,200970,201007,201078,201123,201362,201423,201495,201502,201515,201652,2644016 )
